fact.description: Today's referee, Bjorn Kuipers, has blown to start the match.
Throw-in France.
Switzerland awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Switzerland.
Throw-in for France in their own half.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a free kick to France.
Throw-in for France at Arena Fonte Nova.
In Salvador France attack through Karim Benzema. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Switzerland at Arena Fonte Nova.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a free kick to Switzerland in their own half.
Steve von Bergen is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Play has been resumed.
Steve von Bergen, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Philippe Senderos is the substitute for Switzerland.
Switzerland awarded a free kick in their own half.
France awarded a free kick in their own half.
France's Yohan Cabaye breaks free at Arena Fonte Nova. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Bjorn Kuipers awards Switzerland a goal kick.
Can France get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Switzerland's half?
Ball safe as Switzerland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
France have been awarded a corner by Bjorn Kuipers.
Great play from Mathieu Valbuena to set up the goal.
Karim Benzema instrumental with a fine assist.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a France throw-in in Switzerland's half.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a free kick to France.
Karim Benzema of France is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in France.
France to take a throw-in in Switzerland territory.
Free kick France.
Free kick Switzerland.
France have a goal kick.
Can France get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Switzerland's half?
Bjorn Kuipers signals a free kick to Switzerland in their own half.
France's Karim Benzema gets in a shot on goal at Arena Fonte Nova. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick in a good position for Switzerland!
Switzerland's Granit Xhaka has run offside.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a free kick to France in their own half.
France are coming forward and Olivier Giroud gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Switzerland goal kick.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a France throw-in in Switzerland's half.
Switzerland push forward through Admir Mehmedi, whose finish on goal is saved.
Xherdan Shaqiri of Switzerland gets in a strike, but is off target.
Bjorn Kuipers awards France a goal kick.
An attacking France player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Throw-in for France close to the penalty box.
Mathieu Valbuena for France drives towards goal at Arena Fonte Nova. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Switzerland awarded a free kick in their own half.
France have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Switzerland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
France to take a throw-in in Switzerland territory.
France's Olivier Giroud attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Switzerland goal kick.
Switzerland to take a throw-in in France territory.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a Switzerland throw-in in France's half.
Corner awarded to Switzerland.
Olivier Giroud with an assist there.
Throw-in for France in their own half.
France drive forward and Mathieu Valbuena gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Can Switzerland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in France's half?
Granit Xhaka (Switzerland) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the first half.
Can France get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Switzerland's half?
In Salvador France drive forward through Karim Benzema. His shot is on target but it's saved.
The first-half has come to a close in Salvador.
Ottmar Hitzfeld (Switzerland) is making a second substitution, with Blerim Dzemaili replacing Valon Behrami.
Switzerland are pushing forward but Haris Seferovic's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for France at Arena Fonte Nova.
Can Switzerland capitalize from this throw-in deep inside France's half?
Gokhan Inler gets his shot on target but fails to score for Switzerland.
In Salvador, Olivier Giroud of France is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to France.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a France throw-in in Switzerland's half.
Throw-in for Switzerland at Arena Fonte Nova.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a free kick to France.
France push forward at Arena Fonte Nova and Karim Benzema gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Switzerland defence.
Switzerland to take a throw-in in France territory.
Switzerland's Haris Seferovic misses with an attempt on goal.
France have a goal kick.
France will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Switzerland.
Switzerland have been awarded a corner by Bjorn Kuipers.
Switzerland attack but Granit Xhaka's header doesn't find the target.
Bjorn Kuipers awards France a goal kick.
Free kick Switzerland.
Switzerland's Xherdan Shaqiri gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for France at Arena Fonte Nova.
Olivier Giroud for France gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Switzerland goal kick.
France to take a throw-in in Switzerland territory.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a France throw-in in Switzerland's half.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a throw-in for Switzerland, close to France's area.
France awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Salvador Switzerland attack through Blerim Dzemaili. The finish is off target, however.
France have a goal kick.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a free kick to Switzerland.
Karim Benzema (France) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
France have been awarded a corner by Bjorn Kuipers.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a free kick to France.
Important block from the France defence as Xherdan Shaqiri fires in a strike for Switzerland.
Ball goes out of play for a France goal kick.
Paul Pogba is replacing Olivier Giroud for France at Arena Fonte Nova.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Salvador to check on Mamadou Sakho, who is grimacing with pain.
Admir Mehmedi for Switzerland gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Bjorn Kuipers awards France a goal kick.
The match at Arena Fonte Nova is underway again.
Didier Deschamps (France) has taken off Mamadou Sakho who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Laurent Koscielny is the replacement.
France awarded a free kick in their own half.
That's a fine assist from Paul Pogba.
Can Switzerland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in France's half?
Josip Drmic is on a sub for Haris Seferovic for Switzerland.
Free kick Switzerland.
Corner awarded to Switzerland.
Granit Xhaka's header is off-target for Switzerland.
Goal kick for France at Arena Fonte Nova.
France are coming forward and Patrice Evra gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Bjorn Kuipers awards Switzerland a goal kick.
Karim Benzema with an assist there.
Throw-in for France in their own half.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a free kick to France.
France's Mathieu Valbuena is on target but unsuccessful.
In Salvador France drive forward through Blaise Matuidi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Karim Benzema for France drives towards goal at Arena Fonte Nova. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Switzerland have been awarded a corner by Bjorn Kuipers.
Ball goes out of play for a France goal kick.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a France throw-in in Switzerland's half.
Granit Xhaka of Switzerland smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in Switzerland.
Free kick Switzerland.
France needs to be cautious. Switzerland have an attacking throw-in.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a free kick to Switzerland.
Great play from Antoine Griezmann to set up the goal.
France make their third substitution with Antoine Griezmann replacing Mathieu Valbuena.
Ball safe as Switzerland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bjorn Kuipers signals a free kick to France in their own half.
In Salvador France's Mathieu Debuchy is caught offside.
Throw-in for France at Arena Fonte Nova.
Corner awarded to Switzerland.
Switzerland's Xherdan Shaqiri gets in a shot on goal at Arena Fonte Nova. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick Switzerland.
Gokhan Inler instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick Switzerland.
Yohan Cabaye for France has been booked by Bjorn Kuipers and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Goal kick for France at Arena Fonte Nova.
The second half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Switzerland awarded a throw-in in their own half.
France have a goal kick.
Switzerland to take a throw-in in France territory.
France have a goal kick.
Switzerland awarded a throw-in in their own half.
That's a fine assist from Paul Pogba.
The match has come to a close in Salvador. The final score is 2-6.
Bjorn Kuipers blows to end the match. The final score is 2-5.
